product_name: The North Face Resolve Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: Waterproof, breathable protection for everything from walking the dog to hiking ridgelines, The North Face men's Resolve Rain Jacket with HyVent(R) keeps you dry and comfortable. HyVent 2-layer ripstop nylon shell is also windproof and seam sealed for added waterproofness. Mesh lining enhances airflow and comfort. Brushed collar lining just feels darn good on the neck, especially on wet, chilly days. Adjustable hood of The North Face Resolve Rain Jacket stows away inside the collar. Rip-and-stick stormflap covers the center-front zipper for added weather protection. Zippered hand pockets; adjustable hem.
short_description: Waterproof, breathable protection for everything from walking the dog to hiking ridgelines, The North Face men's Resolve Rain Jacket with HyVent(R) keeps you dry and comfortable.
